about_the_game:
In this game, you play as Jessica, a 23-years old woman. Follow her story that quickly lands her in all sorts of kinky trouble at the office!

A big client is in town, and it was your responsibility to land the deal. However, the client turns out to be more trouble than you expected, and your boss almost fires you for messing things up. To compensate for your failure, your boss gives you an huge pile of work... But the task turns out to be impossible. Desperate, already given up, you're approached by a co-worker while in the bathroom. He proposes a deal: He'll help you with the pile of work, if you'll do what he wants. Things start innocent enough: He asks you to give him your shoes. Fine, you can do that... Then he asks for your shirt... Your heart skips a beat when he starts giving you a collar and handcuffs...

Key Features

  • Female protagonist, who gets into kinky trouble at the office
  • Primarily a rich text-based story that features bondage, bdsm and power dynamics
  • Both con and non-con themes
  • 380 passages with ~50 000 words, split into 4 chapters.
  • Focus on the adult content: More than 2/3 of the passages in this story are nsfw.
  • Multiple endings and two main paths (submissive & defiant).
  • A total of 158 images. (over 90% of passages have images)
  • Mix of 2D/3D images that enhance the story. Can be turned off!
  • Detailed descriptions of the explicit content: The images are not needed to fully immerse yourself in the story.
  • Day and Night mode toggle in the Config Menu

Jessica's Plight is an adult game, aimed for an adult audience and includes explicit text and graphics. The game takes your choices into account to shape the experience, be careful what you do! In total, there are 4 endings. It is a text-based interactive novel with a minimalistic art-style that aims to enhance the text-experience only.

NOTE: The events and scenes in this visual novel can be disturbing for some viewers. This game features bdsm, bondage, sexism, sexual scenes, humiliation and foul language.

  • Has an amazing self-bondage/self-imprisonment scene!
  • I like the devious mind of the blackmailer and the progressiveness of the scenario!
  • Great story and very original writing!

If self-bondage and/or bdsm in general is your thing, you will love this game!
